items.name: Pike Place Roast
items.description: Our signature medium roast with smooth, full-bodied flavour of toasted nuts and cocoa. Brewed fresh every 30 minutes — the coffee Starbucks was built on.

items.name: Caffè Americano
items.description: Bold espresso shots topped with hot water, producing a light crema. A clean, full-bodied drink with a rich, robust flavour profile.

items.name: Caffè Latte
items.description: Rich, full-bodied espresso in steamed milk with a light layer of foam. A timeless classic crafted for those who love smooth, milky coffee.

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Dark espresso balanced with steamed milk and a deep layer of velvety foam. A Starbucks hallmark since 1986, loved for its bold espresso character.

items.name: Flat White
items.description: Ristretto espresso with velvety steamed whole milk in a smaller, stronger serving. An extra-bold take on the classic latte originating from Australia and New Zealand.

items.name: Caffè Mocha
items.description: Full-flavoured espresso combined with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, finished with a generous swirl of sweetened whipped cream. Indulgent and rich.

items.name: White Chocolate Mocha
items.description: Espresso meets creamy white chocolate sauce and steamed milk in this beloved classic, topped with sweetened whipped cream for an irresistibly sweet finish.

items.name: Caramel Macchiato
items.description: Vanilla-flavoured drink with fresh espresso marked with a caramel crosshatch drizzle. Layered beautifully for a balance of sweet and bold.

items.name: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
items.description: Espresso and steamed milk sweetened with cinnamon dolce syrup, topped with whipped cream and a dusting of cinnamon dolce sprinkles. Warmly spiced.

items.name: Vanilla Latte
items.description: Smooth espresso with steamed milk elevated by the sweet, creamy taste of classic vanilla syrup. Simple, satisfying and endlessly drinkable.

items.name: Honey Oat Milk Latte
items.description: Starbucks Blonde® espresso with oat milk, honey blend, and steamed oat milk. A lightly sweet, creamy latte with a golden honey flavour.

items.name: Hazelnut Bianco Latte
items.description: Blonde espresso shots shaken with hazelnut syrup then poured over ice with oat milk. Nutty, sweet, and refreshingly light.

items.name: Iced Caffè Americano
items.description: Espresso shots topped with cold water and poured over ice. Full-bodied and refreshing with that classic espresso boldness.

items.name: Iced Caffè Latte
items.description: Espresso with cold milk poured over ice. A refreshing mid-day sipper with the smooth taste of our espresso blend.

items.name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
items.description: Vanilla syrup, cold milk, ice, and bold espresso topped with a signature caramel drizzle. Sweet, indulgent and impossibly refreshing.

items.name: Iced White Chocolate Mocha
items.description: Espresso with white chocolate sauce, cold milk, and ice, finished with a cloud of sweetened whipped cream. Sweet perfection on ice.

items.name: Iced Vanilla Latte
items.description: Smooth espresso with vanilla syrup shaken with ice and finished with cold milk. A chilled take on our most beloved classic latte.

items.name: Iced Brown Sugar Oat Milk Shaken Espresso
items.description: Blonde espresso shaken with brown sugar syrup and cinnamon, then poured over oat milk and ice. Lightly sweet with a warm, spiced edge.

items.name: Cold Brew Coffee
items.description: Steeped in cool water for 20 hours without heat for an ultra-smooth, naturally sweet flavour. Low acidity, full body — cold coffee perfected.

items.name: Nitro Cold Brew
items.description: Our signature Cold Brew infused with nitrogen for a cascading, velvety texture. Served straight from the tap — no ice needed.

items.name: Salted Caramel Cream Cold Brew
items.description: Cold Brew topped with a float of sweet cream infused with vanilla and a salted caramel drizzle. The ultimate indulgent cold coffee.

items.name: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
items.description: Cold Brew topped with a velvety float of house-made vanilla sweet cream. A perfect blend of bold coffee and delicate sweetness.

items.name: Chai Tea Latte
items.description: Black tea infused with cinnamon, clove, and warming spices combined with steamed milk and topped with foam. Spiced, fragrant and comforting.

items.name: Matcha Green Tea Latte
items.description: Smooth, earthy matcha tea blended with steamed milk for a creamy, vibrant hot tea latte. Naturally sweetened and energising.

items.name: Iced Chai Tea Latte
items.description: Black tea with warm cinnamon and spice, sweetened and poured over ice with cold milk. Spicy, sweet and refreshingly chilled.

items.name: Iced Matcha Tea Latte
items.description: Smooth, earthy matcha whisked with milk and served over ice. Bright, grassy flavour with a satisfying natural sweetness.

items.name: Classic Hot Tea
items.description: A calming pot of premium tea. Choose from Earl Grey, English Breakfast, Mint Majesty, Jade Citrus Mint, or Peach Tranquility herbal blends.

items.name: London Fog Tea Latte
items.description: Earl Grey tea infused with vanilla syrup and topped with steamed milk and foam. A lavender-tinged, aromatic treat beloved by tea lovers.

items.name: Strawberry Açaí Refresher
items.description: Sweet strawberry flavours and whole dried strawberries shaken with ice and Starbucks Refreshers energy — 45mg natural caffeine per serving.

items.name: Mango Dragonfruit Refresher
items.description: Tropical mango flavours with a vibrant magenta colour from real dragon fruit pieces, shaken with ice for a refreshing fruity boost.

items.name: Pink Drink
items.description: Strawberry Açaí Refresher meets coconut milk for a light, creamy iced beverage with a fresh, fruity taste and beautiful blush colour.

items.name: Pineapple Passionfruit Refresher
items.description: Tropical pineapple and passionfruit flavours shaken with ice and pineapple pieces. Bright, citrusy and seriously refreshing.

items.name: Paradise Drink
items.description: Pineapple Passionfruit Refresher meets creamy coconut milk for a tropical, island-inspired iced beverage with sunny pineapple flavours.

items.name: Caramel Frappuccino
items.description: Buttery caramel sauce blended with coffee, ice, and milk, topped with sweetened whipped cream and a caramel drizzle. The classic crowd-pleaser.

items.name: Java Chip Frappuccino
items.description: Mocha sauce and Frappuccino chips blended with coffee, milk, and ice, finished with whipped cream and a mocha drizzle. For the true chocoholic.

items.name: Mocha Frappuccino
items.description: Mocha sauce blended with Frappuccino roast coffee, milk, and ice. Topped with sweetened whipped cream. Chocolatey and refreshing.

items.name: Strawberry Crème Frappuccino
items.description: Strawberry purée layered with vanilla and milk, blended with ice and finished with whipped cream. A delightful crème Frappuccino — no coffee.

items.name: Vanilla Bean Crème Frappuccino
items.description: Pure vanilla flavour blended with milk and ice, topped with sweetened whipped cream. Sweet, simple and utterly satisfying — crème base, no coffee.

items.name: White Chocolate Crème Frappuccino
items.description: White chocolate sauce blended with milk and ice, topped with sweetened whipped cream. A decadently rich crème-based Frappuccino for white chocolate lovers.

items.name: Matcha Crème Frappuccino
items.description: Sweet matcha tea blended with milk and ice, topped with sweetened whipped cream. An earthy, vibrant crème Frappuccino with a naturally beautiful green hue.

items.name: Caramel Ribbon Crunch Frappuccino
items.description: Dark caramel coffee Frappuccino with ribbon of caramel sauce, whipped cream, caramel drizzle, and caramel sugar crystals. A layered masterpiece.

items.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
items.description: Our iconic autumn favourite — espresso with pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove, finished with steamed milk and whipped cream dusted in pumpkin spice. Fall in a cup.

items.name: Peppermint Mocha
items.description: Rich espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and peppermint-flavoured syrup, topped with whipped cream and dark chocolate curls. Holiday indulgence.

items.name: Caramel Brulée Latte
items.description: Espresso with caramel brulée sauce and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream and caramel brulée topping. A festive, caramel-forward holiday treat.

items.name: Toasted White Chocolate Mocha
items.description: Espresso with toasted white chocolate-flavoured sauce and steamed milk, finished with whipped cream and a festive topping. A holiday Starbucks staple.

items.name: Eggnog Latte
items.description: Rich espresso combined with creamy eggnog and steamed milk, dusted with fragrant nutmeg. A classic holiday latte available only in the festive season.

items.name: Iced Pumpkin Cream Cold Brew
items.description: Cold Brew sweetened with vanilla syrup, topped with silky pumpkin cream cold foam and pumpkin spice topping. A chilled autumn dream.

items.name: Cranberry Bliss Bar
items.description: A golden blondie bar topped with lemon cream cheese frosting, dried cranberries, and a white chocolate drizzle. A beloved holiday treat.

items.name: Pumpkin Cream Cheese Muffin
items.description: A double-topped muffin with real pumpkin cream cheese filling and crunchy pepitas on top. Moist, spiced perfection for the autumn season.

items.name: Pumpkin Loaf
items.description: A moist, tender pumpkin loaf made with real pumpkin, cinnamon, and warm spices. A comforting seasonal slice to enjoy with your favourite hot beverage.

items.name: Bacon, Gouda & Egg Sandwich
items.description: Thick-cut, peppered bacon with a fried cage-free egg and aged Gouda cheese on a toasted artisan roll. A hearty breakfast favourite.

items.name: Sausage, Cheddar & Egg Sandwich
items.description: Savory pork sausage patty with a fried egg and sharp cheddar cheese on a warm croissant bun. Comfort food at its finest.

items.name: Turkey Bacon, Cheddar & Egg White Sandwich
items.description: Lean turkey bacon with cage-free egg whites and reduced-fat cheddar on an English muffin. A lighter morning option without compromising flavour.

items.name: Double-Smoked Bacon, Cheddar & Egg Sandwich
items.description: Double-smoked bacon layered with a fried egg and aged white cheddar on a toasted croissant bun. Bold, hearty and unapologetically satisfying.

items.name: Ham & Swiss Croissant
items.description: Sliced black forest ham with melted Swiss cheese on a warm, flaky butter croissant. A classic European-inspired breakfast pairing.

items.name: Spinach, Feta & Egg White Wrap
items.description: Cage-free egg whites with spinach, tomatoes, and feta cheese wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla. Light, protein-packed and nutritiously satisfying.

items.name: Chicken Sausage & Egg Wrap
items.description: Savoury chicken sausage with cage-free egg whites, spinach, and tomatoes wrapped in a warm whole wheat flour tortilla. Lean and filling.

items.name: Bacon & Gruyère Egg Bites
items.description: Applewood-smoked bacon and smooth Gruyère cheese in a fluffy sous vide egg bite. High-protein, low-carb and impossibly creamy. Two per serving.

items.name: Egg White & Red Pepper Egg Bites
items.description: Cage-free egg whites with roasted red pepper, cottage cheese, and Monterey Jack in a sous vide egg bite. Light, airy and packed with protein.

items.name: Kale & Mushroom Egg Bites
items.description: Egg whites with tender kale, roasted mushrooms, and aged Gouda in a sous vide egg bite. Wholesome vegetables meet satisfying protein in every bite.

items.name: Butter Croissant
items.description: A light and flaky all-butter croissant made with real butter and perfectly laminated layers. Golden, delicate, and classically French.

items.name: Chocolate Croissant
items.description: A classic butter croissant with rich, dark chocolate baked inside. Flaky, buttery pastry meets indulgent cocoa in every mouthful.

items.name: Blueberry Scone
items.description: A crumbly, buttery scone studded with plump blueberries, finished with a sweet icing drizzle. A satisfying British-inspired breakfast bake.

items.name: Banana Nut Bread
items.description: Moist, tender banana bread packed with walnuts and the natural sweetness of real bananas. A comforting, classic bake loved for generations.

items.name: Blueberry Muffin
items.description: A generously-sized golden muffin bursting with fresh blueberries throughout. Moist and fluffy with a lightly crisp crown.

items.name: Plain Bagel with Cream Cheese
items.description: A classic plain bagel toasted to perfection and served with a generous portion of smooth cream cheese. A simple, satisfying staple.

items.name: Iced Lemon Loaf
items.description: A moist, zesty lemon-flavoured loaf cake topped with a lemon icing. The perfect sweet slice to complement your favourite Starbucks beverage.

items.name: Birthday Cake Pop
items.description: Moist vanilla cake mixed with icing, dipped in pink chocolatey coating and finished with white sprinkles. A festive little celebration.

items.name: Marshmallow Dream Bar
items.description: The nostalgic crunch of a rice crispy treat reimagined with Starbucks quality. Sweet, chewy, and impossibly satisfying.

items.name: Classic Whole Grain Oatmeal
items.description: Hearty whole grain rolled oats served with your choice of toppings: a nut medley, dried fruit, and brown sugar. A wholesome, warming start.

items.name: Strawberry Overnight Grains
items.description: A chilled whole grain blend with strawberries, honey, and sunflower seeds. Ready-to-eat and packed with fibre and nutrition.

items.name: Eggs & Cheddar Protein Box
items.description: Cage-free hard-boiled eggs, reduced-fat white cheddar, multigrain muesli bread, honey peanut butter, and seasonal fruit. A balanced, protein-packed meal.

items.name: PB&J Protein Box
items.description: Classic peanut butter and strawberry jam with a sesame bagel, seasonal fruit, and a hard-boiled egg. Childhood nostalgia, elevated.

items.name: Grilled Chicken & Hummus Protein Box
items.description: Grilled chicken strips with roasted red pepper hummus, white cheddar, seasonal fruit, and multigrain crackers. Filling, flavourful and high-protein.

items.name: Cheese & Fruit Protein Box
items.description: Reduced-fat white cheddar and smoked Gouda with seasonal fruit, honey peanut butter, and multigrain crackers. The perfect afternoon pick-me-up.

items.name: Edamame & Egg Protein Box
items.description: Cage-free hard-boiled egg with shelled edamame, grape tomatoes, carrots, mini Babybel cheese, and rice crackers. Light, nutritious and satisfying.

items.name: Turkey & Basil Pesto Sandwich
items.description: Sliced turkey breast with basil pesto on toasted multigrain bread, layered with tomatoes, spinach, and havarti cheese. Fresh and flavourful.

items.name: Chicken & Double Smoked Bacon Sandwich
items.description: Tender chicken breast with double-smoked bacon, havarti cheese, tomato, and chipotle aioli on toasted sourdough. Bold, smoky and hearty.

items.name: Ham & Swiss Panini
items.description: Black forest ham with Swiss cheese pressed on toasted ciabatta with wholegrain mustard and lettuce. A warm, European-inspired classic.

items.name: Chicken BLT Salad Sandwich
items.description: Juicy chicken breast with crispy bacon, romaine lettuce, and tomatoes tossed with ranch dressing on toasted artisan bread.

items.name: Zesty Chicken & Black Bean Salad Bowl
items.description: Grilled chicken with black beans, roasted corn, pepitas, and queso fresco on a bed of hearty greens with a zesty lime vinaigrette.

items.name: Caesar Salad with Chicken
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce topped with grilled chicken, Parmesan shavings, croutons, and a classic Caesar dressing. A timeless lunch staple.

settings.tagline: Inspiring and Nurturing the Human Spirit
